name: AVPlayerItemLegibleOutput
desc: An object that vends attributed strings for media with a legible characteristic.

items.name: var textStylingResolution: AVPlayerItemLegibleOutput.TextStylingResolution
items.desc: A string identifier indicating the degree of text styling to be applied to attributed strings vended by the object.

items.name: var delegate: AVPlayerItemLegibleOutputPushDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate of the output class.

items.name: func setDelegate(AVPlayerItemLegibleOutputPushDelegate?, queue: DispatchQueue?)
items.desc: Sets the receiver's delegate and a dispatch queue on which the delegate is called.

items.name: protocol AVPlayerItemLegibleOutputPushDelegate
items.desc: Methods you can implement to provide alternative attributed-string output.

items.name: var advanceIntervalForDelegateInvocation: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time interval, in seconds, that a player item legible output object messages its delegate earlier than normal.

items.name: var delegateQueue: DispatchQueue?
items.desc: The dispatch queue on which the delegate is called.
